## Color.fade() method

Fades the color toward the background, creating an opacity effect.

When applied to a foreground color: - If the color has an explicit background (via `.on()`<!-- -->), fades toward that background - Otherwise, fades toward the terminal's background color

When applied to a background color used in `.on()`<!-- -->: - Fades toward the terminal's background color

**Signature:**

```typescript
fade(amount: number): Color;
```

</td></tr>
